EXTRACTED VALUE: One of the better experiences of 2007 and one of the few to genuinely deliver something of a 'new' experience.
It would seem Polyphony Digital’s claim that Gran Turismo is the world’s ‘Real Driving Simulator’ is well and truly under threat.
At $10, Bionic Commando Rearmed is a steal. It's one of those games that feels organic to play.
The real joy of PGR action is online and the racing is brilliant, especially with friends.
Small problems aside though, this game is more than worth it for the low, low price of ten bucks.
Skate is more than worth checking out for any fan of skateboarding games, providing an experience like no other and one that you won't soon forget.
Better controls, improved animations and full of cool new features. [Nov 2008, p.83]
The most unique Sam Fisher adventure since the original Splinter Cell game.
This is one of those rare titles that add strength to the argument of games as art. Get it.
